price: (41) And listen on the Day when the Caller[1532] will call out from a place that is near -
arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ
footnotes: [1532]- An angel who will call out Allāh's command for the Resurrection.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunādi al-munādi min makānin qarībin
